importantDates.name: Hijri New Year (1 Muharram)
importantDates.description: The beginning of the Islamic year. A time for reflection and renewal.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Hijri New Year is approaching in 2 days. Prepare for reflection and renewal.

importantDates.name: Ashura
importantDates.description: The 10th day of Muharram, a day of fasting and remembrance.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Ashura is approaching in 2 days. Consider fasting on this blessed day.

importantDates.name: Martyrdom of Sayyidina al-Hassan al-Mujtaba (Ø±)
importantDates.description: Commemoration of the martyrdom of Imam Hassan (may Allah be pleased with him).
importantDates.reminderMessage: The martyrdom of Imam Hassan is approaching in 2 days. Remember to send blessings.

importantDates.name: Isra and Mi'raj
importantDates.description: The Night Journey and Ascension of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) to the heavens.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Isra and Mi'raj is approaching in 2 days. A night of great significance.

importantDates.name: 1st Day of Ramadan
importantDates.description: The beginning of the blessed month of Ramadan.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Ramadan begins in 2 days! Prepare for fasting, prayer, and increased worship.

importantDates.name: Lailat-ul-Qadr (21st Night)
importantDates.description: The Night of Power - better than a thousand months.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Lailat-ul-Qadr (21st night) is approaching in 2 days. Seek this blessed night with worship.

importantDates.name: Lailat-ul-Qadr (23rd Night)
importantDates.description: The Night of Power - better than a thousand months.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Lailat-ul-Qadr (23rd night) is approaching in 2 days. Seek this blessed night with worship.

importantDates.name: Lailat-ul-Qadr (25th Night)
importantDates.description: The Night of Power - better than a thousand months.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Lailat-ul-Qadr (25th night) is approaching in 2 days. Seek this blessed night with worship.

importantDates.name: Lailat-ul-Qadr (27th Night)
importantDates.description: The Night of Power - better than a thousand months.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Lailat-ul-Qadr (27th night) is approaching in 2 days. Seek this blessed night with worship.

importantDates.name: Lailat-ul-Qadr (29th Night)
importantDates.description: The Night of Power - better than a thousand months.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Lailat-ul-Qadr (29th night) is approaching in 2 days. Seek this blessed night with worship.

importantDates.name: Eid-ul-Fitr
importantDates.description: The festival of breaking the fast, marking the end of Ramadan.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Eid-ul-Fitr is approaching in 2 days! Prepare for celebration and gratitude.

importantDates.name: Hajj Begins
importantDates.description: The start of the annual pilgrimage to Mecca.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Hajj begins in 2 days. Remember those performing Hajj in your prayers.

importantDates.name: Day of Arafah
importantDates.description: The most important day of Hajj, standing on the plain of Arafah.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Day of Arafah is approaching in 2 days. Fast on this day if not performing Hajj.

importantDates.name: Eid-ul-Adha
importantDates.description: The festival of sacrifice, commemorating Prophet Ibrahim's willingness to sacrifice.
importantDates.reminderMessage: Eid-ul-Adha is approaching in 2 days! Prepare for sacrifice and celebration.
